name: Baby2Body Limited
description: Developer of a digital ecosystem intended for women to have all their wellness needs met, from first period to last. The company connects female health consumers with wellness experts, products, and services, in a personalized way and provides women with a unique health profile based on data inputs and receive personalized wellness solutions to create a network with women and get the wellness support they need to live better and gain powerful insights in order to offer more effective solutions, enabling women to track and monitor their personal health data from optimum time to conception to postpartum recovery.
one_liner: Developer of a digital ecosystem intended for women to have all their wellness needs met, from first period to last. The company connects female health consumers with wellness experts, products, and services, in a personalized way and provides women with a unique health profile based on data inputs and receive personalized wellness solutions to create a network with women and get the wellness support they need to live better and gain powerful insights in order to offer more effective solutions, enabling women to track and monitor their personal health data from optimum time to conception to postpartum recovery.
